titleStmt.title: Edgar, or the English monarch an heroick tragedy. By Mr. Thomas Rymer, servant to Their Majesties.
titleStmt.author: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Knapton, at the Crown in St. Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Includes an advertisment page on p. [5] and p. [1] at end of text.
Caption title on p. 1: Edgar, a tragedy.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
